data.text: Yaa Waaqayyo, ani garaa koo guutuudhaan sin galateeffadha;
Ani sittin gammada; nan ililchas;
Diinonni koo dugda duubatti ni deebiʼu;
Mirga koo fi dhimma koo qabatteerta;
Saboota ifattee hamootas balleessiteerta;
Diinonni badiisa bara baraatiin balleeffamu;
Waaqayyo garuu bara baraan ni moʼa;
Inni qajeelummaadhaan addunyaadhaaf murtii ni kenna;
Waaqayyo warra cunqurfamaniif irkoo dha;
Warri maqaa kee beekan si amanatu;
Waaqayyo isa Xiyoon irra jiraatu faarfannaadhaan jajadhaa;
Inni haaloo dhiigaa baasu sunis isaan yaadataatii;
Yaa Waaqayyo, hammam akka diinonni koo na ariʼatan ilaali!
kunis ani karra Intala Xiyoon irratti
Saboonni boolla qotan keessa buʼan;
Waaqayyo murtii qajeelaa kennuudhaan beekama;
Namoonni hamoon,
Rakkattoonni garuu yoom iyyuu hin irraanfataman;
Yaa Waaqayyo kaʼi; jabinni namaa hin mulʼatin;
Yaa Waaqayyo, sodaa isaanitti buusi;
